name: DropLoc
description: Revolutionary auto-loading cannabis tincture bottles with certified child resistant caps.
seo_description: DropLocs are fully affordable customizable cannabis tincture bottles. Customization options including size, color, labelling and printing.
advantages: Black, white or clear glass body
Gold, silver, black or frosted cap
first_description: Traditional tincture bottles are basic in look and function. Our breakthrough auto-load cap system brings them into the 21st century, designed to appeal today’s sophisticated consumers.
second_description: The functional, practical auto-load system draws the product as you open the cap. It reliably offers a precise metered dose for methodical, mindful consumption.
third_description: DropLoc’s sleek, stylish aesthetics will look as good on your customer’s bathroom shelves as it does on your brand’s social media channels.
